title: Everyday Ceramic Design Simulation Workshop Utilizing Multimedia

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic ceramic material properties and design principles, experience using smartphone-based apps
context.additional_context: Practice-centered educational environment utilizing smartphones and simple VR devices. Learners solve design problems reflecting real industrial site requirements.

learning_goals: Produce three or more 3D models reflecting functional/aesthetic requirements of daily ceramic products using BPNN-based 3D modeling tools.
Implement real-time design variations and user feedback through multimedia interactive interfaces.
Develop and present one marketable ceramic design prototype through team-based project execution.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
